title: Tangent line approximation of value of a function

content.question: Let f be the function given by f(x) = 2 cos x + 1. What is the approximation for f(1.5) found by using the line tangent to the graph of f at <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac> <mi>π</mi> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3ADE@</annotation> </semantics> </math>?

topic.text: 4.6: Approximating Values of a Function Using Local Linearity and Linearization

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Explain how an approximated value relates to the actual value.
